channel.title: GTA IV Modding
channel.description:
Does anybody know or have a tutorial for modding GTA IV with a USB? I've been looking for a while now but all I can find is horizon mods, which can only really allow max ammo and max health. I'm looking for stuff like super speed cars, flying cars, etc. Pretty much anything that can't already be gotten on horizon.
Thanks :3

item.title: GTA IV Modding
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

You need ISO mods for flying cars, speed, ect. online
Horizon will give you godmode, ammo, ect. in the campaign.
if you need help with Horizon, I’m “Speak” on their forums.

Read full topic

item.title: GTA IV Modding
item.dc:creator: @Pink_Phat Pink Phat
item.description:
@Pink_Phat wrote:

TabbyKiller:

Just use a program called Horizon and 360 Revolution. If you want I’ll do a tut on it some time

With these programs am I able to do mods like the aforementioned ones? If so, a tut would be excellent.

Read full topic
